description: Variation of Condition No. 10 (Property usage) of Planning Permission L/HAV/772/74 dated 23/07/1974 to remove reference to 'nominated by the Help the Aged Housing Society or a similar body recognised by the council' and to add an absolute mortgagee exclusion clause. (32 x 1 bed units, 8 bed sit units, 1 x 3 bed flat).
decision_conditions: The proposed change in the wording of the condition as suggested would remove the requirement for the facility to be provided by a housing society or similar and is considered likely to give rise to conditions that could result in the loss of a community facility.  In the absence of details satisfactorily demonstrating that the loss of this facility for the current intended purposes would not be prejudicial to the local community, the proposal is contrary to Policies CP2 and  DC27 of the Local Development Framework Core Strategy and Development Control Policies Development Plan Document, Policy 16 of the Havering Proposed Submission Local Plan and Policy S1 of the London Plan.

Statement Required by Article 35 (2) of the Town and Country Planning (Development Management Procedure) (England) Order 2015: Consideration was given to seeking amendments, but given conflict with adopted planning policy, notification of intended refusal and the reason(s) for it was given to the applicant's agent on 21st October 2021. .
